summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 CHEVROLET TAHOE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V381000 (AIR BAGS) EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR REPAIR. THE CONTACT RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTIFICATION IN JUNE OF 2016. THE DEALER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURER INFORMED THE CONTACT OF THE PETITION AND THAT SHE HAD UNTIL AUGUST OF 2017 TO SUPPORT THE INVESTIGATION TO DETERMINE IF HER VEHICLE WOULD BE INCLUDED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
